trans-unit.source: Obtain the connection string from the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Obtain the connection string from the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Use the [Azure preview portal](http://portal.azure.com/) to obtain the connection string necessary for your client program to interact with Azure SQL Database:
trans-unit.target: Use the [Azure preview portal](http://portal.azure.com/) to obtain the connection string necessary for your client program to interact with Azure SQL Database:

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of your database into the filter text box near the upper-left of the **SQL databases** blade.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name of your database into the filter text box near the upper-left of the **SQL databases** blade.

trans-unit.source: Click the row for your database.
trans-unit.target: Click the row for your database.

trans-unit.source: After the blade appears for your database, for visual convenience you can click the standard minimize controls to collapse the blades you used for browsing and database filtering.
trans-unit.target: After the blade appears for your database, for visual convenience you can click the standard minimize controls to collapse the blades you used for browsing and database filtering.

trans-unit.source: On the blade for your database, click **Show database connection strings**.
trans-unit.target: On the blade for your database, click **Show database connection strings**.

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use the ODBC connection library, copy the string labeled **ODBC (Includes Node.js)**.
trans-unit.target: If you intend to use the ODBC connection library, copy the string labeled **ODBC (Includes Node.js)**.

trans-unit.source: Copy the ODBC connection string for your database
trans-unit.target: Copy the ODBC connection string for your database

trans-unit.source: Paste the connection string information into your client program code.
trans-unit.target: Paste the connection string information into your client program code.

trans-unit.source: You will need to replace the {your_password_here} with your real password.
trans-unit.target: You will need to replace the {your_password_here} with your real password.
